meanings.sent1: The new car model is gassier than the older version.
meanings.sent2: The balloon became gassier as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent3: The gassier balloon made funny noises when squeezed.
meanings.sent4: The room felt gassier than usual after the gas leak.
meanings.sent5: The gassier smell from the kitchen made everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: The gassier stove produced more flames.
meanings.sent2: The gassier exhaust pipe released a cloud of smoke.
meanings.sent3: The gassier candle flickered in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The gassier volcano erupted with great force.
meanings.sent5: The gassier skunk sprayed its odor to defend itself.

meanings.sent1: Beans are known to be gassier foods.
meanings.sent2: The gassier foods can cause bloating in some people.
meanings.sent3: The gassier soda made everyone burp at the party.
meanings.sent4: The gassier compost pile attracted more insects.
meanings.sent5: The gassier fertilizer helped the plants grow faster.
